info.name: Tumblr - Blaine Anderson theme 1
info.description:
Glee's Blaine Anderson themed dash for tumblr
-purple background
-gif collage menu
-Blaine Anderson tumblr logo
info.additionalInfo: If you don't want the included tumblr menu: just find the url for the menu (ctrl+f and search for "gif" and it should take you to the url) and replace it either with your own menu image OR if you want the original tumblr menu, replace it with the next url in the code (ctrl+f "assets" should take you to the next one).
